components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
CLC @ 10.111.5.10
While trying to reproduce a separate issue I set the VPC stress test/job to trigger itself. After it ran for about 4-5 hours all VMs in the test began to fail. The VMs are failing to get metadata. 
I've ran VMs manually in new and existing accounts that were not in use by the test and those VMs seems to work. I've also verified running new VMs by hand using the accounts used in the tests 
Accounts: nephstress100 through nephstress139 (user=admin) that new VMs do not receive Metadata. 

I've left the instance I ran manually up for debugging purposes, and rebooted it several times. Console output shows MD continues to timeout. 
{code}
In [99]: user.ec2.show_instances([ins])
[2015-10-17 22:11:34,012][INFO][EC2ops(nephstress100:admin)]: 
+---------------------+--------------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|INSTANCE ID          |INSTANCE IMAGE      |INSTANCE STATE     |INSTANCE NETWORK INFO:                                                      |
+---------------------+--------------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|ID: i-873bc637       |EMI: emi-54a7d3b0   |STATE: running     |NODE:???	KEYPAIR:nephtest100                                                |
|TYPE: m1.small       |OS: linux           |AGE: 1456          |+------------+---------------+-----------+-+---------------+---------------+|
|RES: r-ac880458      |VIRT: HVM           |ZONE: two          ||    VPC     |     SUBNET    |  SEC GRPS |P|    PRIV IP    |     PUB IP    ||
|ACCOUNT ID:          |IMAGE NAME:         |ROOTDEV:           |+------------+---------------+-----------+-+---------------+---------------+|
|000912658706         |preciseservercloud..|instance-store     ||vpc-48b94e75|subnet-1f139650|sg-ddc55f94|N|  172.31.16.56 | 10.116.170.35 ||
+---------------------+--------------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

ci-info: lo    : 1 127.0.0.1       255.0.0.0       .
ci-info: eth0  : 1 172.31.16.56    255.255.240.0   d0:0d:4a:49:ac:82
ci-info: route-0: 0.0.0.0         172.31.16.1     0.0.0.0         eth0   UG
ci-info: route-1: 172.31.16.0     0.0.0.0         255.255.240.0   eth0   U
cloud-init start running: Sat, 17 Oct 2015 22:08:50 +0000. up 1.44 seconds
2015-10-18 05:09:41,960 - util.py[WARNING]: 'http://169.254.169.254/2009-04-04/meta-data/instance-id' failed [25251/120s]: url error [timed out]
2015-10-18 05:09:41,960 - DataSourceEc2.py[CRITICAL]: giving up on md after 25251 seconds
{code}

Sample test w/ 2 users 2 VMs:
http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8080/view/Matts/job/nephoria_stress_test/193/

It appears all the artifacts are in place

I see this warning in eucanetd.log
{code}
2015-10-17 21:14:26  WARN 000032355 connect_mido_vpc_instanc | input ip is 0.0.0.0: nothing to do
{code}



And these erorrs in /var/log/nginx/
{code}
2015/10/16 15:57:53 [emerg] 1742#0: still could not bind()
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:56 [emerg] 3052#0: still could not bind()
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31337 failed (98: Address already in use)
2015/10/16 15:57:58 [emerg] 5576#0: bind() to 0.0.0.0:31338 failed (98: Address already in use)

{code}
fields.summary: VPC - Metadata for VMs no longer available for accounts used in churn test

comments.body: [~mclark], have you worked with [~dannurmi] on this?
